const final class

build::Target

sys::Obj
  build::Target : sys::Facet

@Serializable { simple=false collection=false }

Target facet is applied to a BuildScript method to indicate it is a build target or goal.

Slots

helpSource

const Str help := ""

String for usage help, should be a single short line summary of target
